entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Rain or snow beginning near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm in a few localities. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023
